name: War Criminal Game
description:
"We celebrate the war criminals in our cities and we want to make sure that people will go about their lives calmly, peacefully and safely," said Outhouse Media co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Christopher Tanti. "We have developed this video game to show the world that gun violence is just another form of violence, and we invite everyone to join us in making sure that we do everything in our power to stop it."
War Criminal Game is an action-packed most-lethal gun-fight game, but it's all procedural. It comes with an option to kill everyone in the building, and in a now-deleted video description, it also "allows the player to build their own custom set of death machines that can fall back on any means necessary to take down their target. In War Criminal Game, you can choose from a variety of different weapons, and multiple variations each with their own unique gameplay." War Criminal Game is available for Windows PCs now and is not meant for the next-gen console, OUYA.com informs. – Share your thoughts below.
